tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE products (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL,
    quantity INT,
    reorder_threshold INT
)

CREATE TABLE reorder_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  old_inventory_level INT,
  new_inventory_level INT,
  reorder_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE Product (id INT, name VARCHAR(255), inventory INT, threshold INT);
CREATE TABLE InventoryLog (id INT, product_id INT, previous_inventory INT, new_inventory INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE ReorderTrigger (id INT, product_id INT, reorder_quantity INT, reorder_timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE ReorderHistory (id INT, product_id INT, reorder_quantity INT, reorder_timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE ThresholdNotification (id INT, product_id INT, threshold INT, notification_message VARCHAR(255), notification_timestamp TIMESTAMP);
